title: Avoiding Temptation
description: A sexy angsty second chance romance from USA Today bestselling author K.A. Linde…Two years after walking out on Jack’s wedding, Lexi is finally in a good place. Her career has taken off. Her relationship is solid. Her life in Atlanta is everything she thought she wanted.Then Ramsey proposes.And Jack confides that he and Bekah are getting a divorce.Lexi begins to question everything she thought she knew about what she wanted.She has to choose her own path.That just might mean deciding, once and for all, where her heart truly lies.
author: K.A. Linde
